title: Women on Fire Volume 2: 21 Inspiring Women Share Their Life Secrets
description: In this powerful and inspiring collection twenty-one courageous women share their stories of heartache, loss, and discovery and how they battled their way through to find a life of freedom, compassion, and joy on the other side. Executive coach Debbie Phillips created the Women on Fire organization to provide women with the inspiration, strategies, and support they need to lead the lives of their dreams. She assembled "Women on Fire Volume 2" to be a treasury of loving guidance for every woman today striving to fulfill an ever-growing list of roles.
author: Debbie  Phillips
